# your code goes here
from sys import stdin, stdout
from collections import Counter
t = int(stdin.readline())
d = {"odd":1, "even":0}
while t:
	t -= 1
	n, q = map(int, stdin.readline().strip().split(' '))
	s = stdin.readline().strip()
	s = Counter(s)
	for i in range(q):
		c, m = stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')
		stdout.write("yes\n" if s[c]%2 == d[m] else "no\n")
